roleset.name: conquer, get past
roleset.note: OVERCOME-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overcome' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry exceed-90, no Framenet entry. Comparison with 'beat'. Loosely. (from overcome.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Still, Unisys said its European business was weak during the quarter, a worrisome sign given that [the company]-1 has relied on solid results overseas *trace*-1 to overcome weakness in the U.S. over the past several quarters.
